name: CLKComplicationTimelineAnimationBehavior
desc: Constants indicating the animation behavior during Time Travel.

items.name: case never
items.desc: No animations. This is the default behavior.

items.name: case grouped
items.desc: Animations between groups. During Time Travel, ClockKit creates animations when transitioning between entries with different group identifiers. For entries with identical group identifiers, the new entry is displayed without animations.

items.name: case always
items.desc: Always animate transitions. During Time Travel, ClockKit creates animations between all entries, regardless of the values of their group identifiers.
